Growth of an ABS indicator.

growth.Rd

Growth of an ABS indicator.

Usage

growth(
  data = NULL,
  filter_with = NULL,
  ym = "year",
  at_year = NULL,
  at_month = NULL
)

Arguments

data

A dataframe of tidyed ABS data

filter_with

A list of which variables to filter the dataframe by. Must be a list. Can specify indicator, gender, state, age, and series_type. Indicator must be specified

ym

ym = "year" to calculate the change over the year, or ym = "month" to calculate the change over the month

at_year

By default, change() returns the difference over the past 12 months (to the current year). at_year and at_month can be specified to calculate the change between the current value, and the value as at at_year and at_month.

at_month

By default, change() returns the difference over the past 12 months (to the current year). at_year and at_month can be specified to calculate the change between the current value, and the value as at at_year and at_month.

Value

dataframe

Examples

if (FALSE) growth(labour_force, filter_with = list(indicator = "Unemployment rate")) # \dontrun{}
